title: Create Assets Request
description: Schema for creating single or multiple assets

file.description: Single uploaded file (multipart/form-data) - for single file upload

files.description: Array of uploaded files (multipart/form-data) - for multiple file upload

folder.description: Folder name to store the asset(s) in (alphanumeric, underscore, dash only)

file_name.description: Custom filename with extension for single file upload

file_names.description: Array of custom filenames with extensions for multiple file upload

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing files with same names
